name: Comfort Suites Inn at Ridgewood Farm

reviews.title: When will people start caring about bed comfort?
reviews.text: Overall the room was clean, stocked, and in working order. The thing I did not like, as is many times the case with me, were the beds. Mind you, I am a little picky about beds, but I think that is the primary thing a hotel is for, sleeping. Why then, shouldn't I be. The beds in this place were not at all comforitable, and I did not get a good nights sleep, and neither did my wife or kids.

reviews.title: Nice place to stay
reviews.text: I would absolutely LOVE beyond words to describe it if tripadvisor would have an actual 5 dot review button for BED COMFORT.

reviews.title: Very Nice
reviews.text: Two things we need in shelter, a roof that don't leak and a bed to lie in. :)

aka: Comfort Suites Inn At Ridgewood Farm Hotel Salem
